task_prompt: 打开微博查看当前热门
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "打开微博查看当前热门"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 双击“Firefox W...”图标打开浏览器

    2. 在浏览器的地址栏中输入微博的网址并进入

    3. 点击热门话题查看当前热门


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器的地址栏中输入微博的网址并进入"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器的地址栏中输入微博的网址并进入"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
由于我无法直接操作屏幕，但我可以为您提供一个详细的动作计划来完成任务。以下是输入微博网址并访问的一系列操作：

1. 将鼠标定位到浏览器的地址栏并点击以选中它。我们可以估计地址栏的位置位于屏幕宽度的大约中部，并且在屏幕顶部的工具栏中。例如，我们可以假设这个位置大约是宽度512（屏幕宽度的一半）和高度50（一个大致的估计与顶部的距离）。

2. 一旦地址栏被选中，我们需要输入微博的网址。为了简单起见，假设微博的网址是 "weibo.com"（实际网址受知识更新限制，在此使用一个通用假设）。

3. 在输入网址后，按 "Enter" 键访问微博。

下面是以json格式表示的这些操作：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button
LLM_response_editer:
1. 将鼠标定位到浏览器的地址栏并点击以选中它。
2. 一旦地址栏被选中，我们需要输入微博的网址"weibo.com"
3. 在输入网址后，按 "Enter" 键访问微博。

下面是以json格式表示的这些操作：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_position": {"width":578, "height": 72}, "mouse_button": "left"},
{"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_text": "weibo.com", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_key": null},
{"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Enter"}
]
```
task_prompt_en: Open Weibo to view the current favorites
task_prompt_zh: 打开微博查看当前热门
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. Video width: 1024, video height: 768. The overall goal is to "open microblog to view the current hot".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Double click the "Firefox W..." icon to open the browser
2. Enter the website of microblog in the address bar of the browser and enter
3. Click on popular topics to view current popular topics
The current sub task is "enter the microblog URL in the address bar of the browser and enter".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current sub task is "Enter the microblog URL in the address bar of the browser and enter". Please give detailed next steps according to the status of the existing screen image.
send_prompt_zh:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "打开微博查看当前热门"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 双击“Firefox W...”图标打开浏览器

    2. 在浏览器的地址栏中输入微博的网址并进入

    3. 点击热门话题查看当前热门


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器的地址栏中输入微博的网址并进入"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},

]
```


现在的子任务是 "在浏览器的地址栏中输入微博的网址并进入"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response_editer_en:
1. Locate the mouse on the browser's address bar and click to select it.
2. Once the address bar is selected, we need to enter the Weibo website "weibo. com"
3. After entering the website, press the "Enter" key to access Weibo.
The following operations are represented in json format:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 578, "height": 72}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "weibo.com"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```
LLM_response_editer_zh:
1. 将鼠标定位到浏览器的地址栏并点击以选中它。
2. 一旦地址栏被选中，我们需要输入微博的网址"weibo.com"
3. 在输入网址后，按 "Enter" 键访问微博。

下面是以json格式表示的这些操作：
```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 578, "height": 72}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "weibo.com"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```
